## ParagraphTextValidationBuilder

### Methods

- requireTextContainsPattern(pattern) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
- requireTextDoesNotContainPattern(pattern) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
- requireTextDoesNotMatchPattern(pattern) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
- requireTextLengthGreaterThanOrEqualTo(number) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
- requireTextLengthLessThanOrEqualTo(number) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
- requireTextMatchesPattern(pattern) — ParagraphTextValidationBuilder
